settings.guarantee_text: Melt Fat Or Get Your Money Back!

settings.heading: GlucoVantage® (Dihydroberberine)
settings.description: Think of it like a traffic cop in your body: When you eat carbs, this ingredient directs them toward your muscles for energy instead of letting them take the "fat storage highway." It's 5x more powerful than regular berberine because it actually gets absorbed. Clinical studies show it reduces waist circumference by an average of 3.27 cm.

settings.heading: Grains of Paradise
settings.description: Contains 6-paradol compounds that selectively activate brown adipose tissue (BAT)—metabolically active fat cells that burn calories through non-shivering thermogenesis. Think of BAT as specialized furnaces that consume stored fat to generate heat. Clinical trials demonstrate significant increases in whole-body energy expenditure and visceral fat reduction.

settings.heading: Lactobacillus Gasseri (10 Billion CFU)
settings.description: Picture a bouncer at your gut's door: This probiotic literally escorts some of the fat you eat right out of your body before it can be stored. It's like having a security system that says "nope, not today" to excess dietary fat. Clinical trials show significant belly fat reduction in 12 weeks.

settings.heading: Cayenne Pepper Extract (40,000 SHU)
settings.description: Like turning up your body's thermostat: The capsaicin makes your internal furnace burn hotter, so you're torching more calories even while watching TV. Research shows it significantly boosts your calorie-burning engine.

settings.heading: Ashwagandha Extract (KSM-66)
settings.description: Think of cortisol as a panicked manager: When you're stressed, cortisol screams "STORE EVERYTHING AS FAT!" Ashwagandha is like a wise coach that calms down the panicked manager, so your body stops hoarding calories around your belly. Clinical studies show it silences the stress-storage signal.

settings.heading: DIM + Boron Power Duo
settings.description: Imagine your hormones as a seesaw: Too much estrogen tips you toward soft, feminine fat storage. This duo is like adding weight to the testosterone side—Boron boosts free testosterone 28% and cuts estrogen 39% in just 7 days. DIM helps your body flush out the "bad" estrogen that makes you soft.

settings.heading: Zinc Glycinate
settings.description: Like premium oil for a high-performance engine: Your testosterone production machinery needs zinc to run. Without it, even a Ferrari becomes a broken-down car. Studies show fixing zinc deficiency can nearly double testosterone.

settings.heading: L-Theanine
settings.description: Crosses the blood-brain barrier to increase alpha brain wave activity and modulate neurotransmitter balance (dopamine, serotonin). Clinical studies demonstrate significant anxiety reduction and improved sleep quality metrics.

settings.heading: Ashwagandha Extract (KSM-66)
settings.description: Beyond cortisol regulation, this adaptogen supports endogenous testosterone production. Randomized trials show 14.7% greater testosterone increases in aging males, directly supporting energy metabolism and vitality.

settings.heading: Zinc Glycinate
settings.description: Functions as cofactor for over 300 enzymatic reactions governing cellular energy production and hormone synthesis. Zinc deficiency impairs metabolic efficiency and recovery processes.

settings.heading: Ashwagandha Extract (KSM-66)
settings.description: Think of stress cravings like a fire alarm: When cortisol goes off, it screams "EAT EVERYTHING NOW!" Ashwagandha turns off that false alarm, so you stop reaching for junk food every time life gets stressful. Studies show it dramatically reduces stress-triggered food cravings.

settings.heading: L-Theanine
settings.description: Promotes parasympathetic nervous system activation, supporting cognitive control over food choices during stress responses. Maintains focus without stimulatory side effects.

settings.heading: Cayenne Pepper Extract (40,000 SHU)
settings.description: Imagine your appetite as a volume dial: Capsaicin naturally turns down the volume on hunger signals, making it easier to eat the right amount without feeling deprived. Research shows it helps reduce overall food intake.

settings.heading: GlucoVantage® (Dihydroberberine)
settings.description: Improves insulin sensitivity and glucose homeostasis, preventing reactive hypoglycemia that triggers carbohydrate cravings and compensatory eating behaviors.

settings.heading: 90 Days to Become Every Day Dad
settings.description:
Take Thaura full 90 days. If you're not coming home with energy left—if still collapsing while kids play alone—email us.
We'll refund every penny. No questions, no hassle.
Kids are only young once. We want you to experience showing up for them.
You can't get these years back. But you can get your energy back.

settings.heading: When will I notice results?
settings.description: Most men: improved evening energy within 2-3 weeks. Full benefits build over 3-4 weeks as cortisol regulates.

settings.heading: Is there caffeine in this?
settings.description: Zero. No caffeine, no stimulants. Thaura restores natural energy production instead of artificially stimulating you.

settings.heading: Can I take with morning coffee?
settings.description: Yes, no interactions. Though most men naturally drink less coffee within 2-3 weeks because they don't need it.

settings.heading: Will this make me jittery?
settings.description: No. No stimulants = no stimulant side effects. No jitters, racing heart, or anxiety. Most report feeling calmer.

settings.heading: What time should I take it?
settings.description: 2 capsules daily with food. Most take morning or early afternoon. Timing flexible.

settings.heading: Any side effects?
settings.description: Excellent safety profiles in studies. Some experience mild digestive adjustment first few days (take with food). If on medications (thyroid, blood sugar, blood pressure), consult doctor first.

settings.heading: What if it doesn't work?
settings.description: Email support@thaura.com within 90 days for full refund. We'll ask what you experienced but won't hassle you.

settings.heading: How is this different from other energy supplements?
settings.description: Most are just caffeine disguised. Thaura uses adaptogens (KSM-66) that work differently: reducing cortisol so your body restores natural energy. Clinical doses, third-party tested, zero stimulants.

settings.heading: Shipping time?
settings.description: Ships within 24 hours. Arrives 3-5 business days. Free shipping all orders.

settings.s2_heading: “Weight Loss” Is the #1 Most Frustrating Symptom for Men Over 30
settings.s2_subheading: Even When You’re Doing Everything Right
settings.s2_description:
You've tried keto, intermittent fasting, even those energy supplements and fat-burners from the vitamin store. Nothing worked long-term because they ignored what really changed after 35.

After 35, your metabolism changes in ways most supplements and diets don’t address.

That's why you can follow the same diet that worked before and see minimal results. Or work out consistently but still have a soft midsection. Your body isn't broken - you're just using the wrong approach for what your current metabolism can handle.

Think of it like outdated software – you're still running the same diet and exercise routines, but your body responds differently now. Here's what's actually happening:
settings.s2_description2:
The result? You eat well. You stay active. But the results are minimal. Energy fluctuates. And your body composition doesn't reflect your efforts. 

The solution isn't working harder – it's working smarter. By targeting these specific metabolic switches, with the right compounds at the right doses, you can reboot your body’s operating system to burn fat like it did in your 20s.
settings.s3_heading: Finally, Fix All Three Roadblocks at Once!
settings.s3_subheading:
Thanks To Breakthrough Research From Leading Hormone Scientists  

There's now a proven a way for men of all ages, body types, and fitness levels to reduce chest and belly fat
settings.s3_description: While other men effortlessly maintain their physique as they age, 65% are frustrated by man boobs and beer bellies, no matter how little they drink or how much they train. It's time to break free from the cycle of working hard with no results..
settings.s4_heading: Join Thousands of Men Finally Losing Weight & Reclaiming Their Vitality
settings.s4_description:
The problem is, popular diets and supplements throw random ingredients at you, completely ignoring what’s going on inside. Worse, they use synthetic fillers and proprietary blends that hide weak doses.

Dryft™ works by targeting all three metabolic switches at once with clinically-effective doses. 

Just 2 capsules a day reset:
